display_long_description:
🦍 GorillaRunner
Climb. Swing. Chase. Escape. Become the fastest gorilla in VR.

GorillaRunner is a multiplayer, physics-based VR experience built around pure movement. Using only your arms — no sticks, no teleporting — you'll swing, launch, and run across immersive maps filled with obstacles, secrets, and other gorillas just as wild as you.

Whether you're tagging friends in fast-paced chases, exploring intricate maps, or testing your skills in parkour challenges, GorillaRunner delivers an energetic and dynamic VR experience that keeps you coming back for one more run.

🔥 What Makes GorillaRunner Unique?
🦍 Physics-Based Movement
Just like in Gorilla Tag, you control your gorilla with your hands. Push off the ground, climb walls, vault over obstacles — all through natural arm movements that feel intuitive and immersive.

🌍 Expansive Multiplayer Maps
Traverse a variety of environments — from dense jungle canopies and mountaintop temples to neon-lit rooftops and wild playgrounds. Each map is handcrafted to maximize movement creativity and exploration.

🎮 Online Multiplayer Fun
Join public or private lobbies and play fast-paced tag modes, obstacle courses, or just hang out and practice your skills. Whether you're competing or chilling, GorillaRunner is all about community and connection.

🎨 Custom Cosmetics
Express your style with unlockable hats, gloves, and more. Stay fresh while you swing through the trees — all cosmetics are earned through gameplay (no microtransactions here).
